languageKey.label: PHPIDS
Show all impacts
Clear the log table
Clear the cache table
Update converter and filter
This shows all impacts with an impact level higher then the value you specified in the TypoScript object Impact.db_threshold.
You can find all impacts in the logfile you specified in the TypoScript object Logging.path.
In the TypoScript Objects of PHPIDS you can set General.debug_mode to true to check if PHPIDS works correctly.
This will set all DB entries in the tx_mkphpids_log table to deleted=1 and no longer show them in "Show all impacts". Are you sure you want to do that?
Successfully set all entrys in the tx_mkphpids_log table to deleted=1.
This will truncate the tx_mkphpids_cache table and delete all of its records. Are you sure you want to do that?
Successfully truncated tx_mkphpids_cache.
Here you can update the default_filer.xml and the Converter.php for PHPIDS from:
These files are necessary to identify the latest attacks and intrusion attemps.
Update succesfull.
